attributes.comment:
Please reconsider the proposed changes that would increase the fingerprint and I-
600A fees.

Because of increasing China adoption wait times, all families will have to refile a
new I-600A form. Please consider how costly and time consuming this will be for
your office in having to re-process an application which has already been approved.

Refiling a new I-600A that has already been approved seems frivolous and a poor
use of USCIS resources.

Please do not burden families who are waiting to adopt with the need to resubmit
another I-600A when we have not even had the chance to use the one you gave us
initially.

Respectfully,
Michael Willoughby
Waiting parent

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Michael D. Willoughby
